1.Title: Behemoth Hunter
1.Description: When the target's HP is no lower than 50%, the equipper inflicts <color=#2BAD00>10%</color> more Daze to the target. When the target's HP is no lower than 75%, this bonus is further increased by <color=#2BAD00>10%</color>.

2.Title: Behemoth Hunter
2.Description: When the target's HP is no lower than 50%, the equipper inflicts <color=#2BAD00>11.5%</color> more Daze to the target. When the target's HP is no lower than 75%, this bonus is further increased by <color=#2BAD00>11.5%</color>.

3.Title: Behemoth Hunter
3.Description: When the target's HP is no lower than 50%, the equipper inflicts <color=#2BAD00>13%</color> more Daze to the target. When the target's HP is no lower than 75%, this bonus is further increased by <color=#2BAD00>13%</color>.

4.Title: Behemoth Hunter
4.Description: When the target's HP is no lower than 50%, the equipper inflicts <color=#2BAD00>14.5%</color> more Daze to the target. When the target's HP is no lower than 75%, this bonus is further increased by <color=#2BAD00>14.5%</color>.

5.Title: Behemoth Hunter
5.Description: When the target's HP is no lower than 50%, the equipper inflicts <color=#2BAD00>16%</color> more Daze to the target. When the target's HP is no lower than 75%, this bonus is further increased by <color=#2BAD00>16%</color>.
